name: Conduct SWOT analysis on competitors with ChatGPT and store results on a Google Sheet - Quick version
description:
Add competitor websites to a Google Sheet and rapidly perform competitor SWOT analysis using ChatGPT and instantly save insightful data on the same sheet for easy access and improved decision-making.

Your sheet must have the following columns:
A - Company website
B - Strengths
C - Weaknesses
D - Opportunities
E - Threats
